name: find-config
description: Extract configuration examples and code snippets from documentation. Finds YAML, JSON, shell scripts, and other configuration files.
author: MCP Docs RAG

config_type.description: Type of configuration to find (e.g., 'kubernetes deployment', 'terraform')

language.description: Code language filter (yaml, json, bash, hcl, etc.)

workflow.description: Get surrounding documentation for each config
workflow.logic: For each found config, retrieve the file and extract context

workflow.description: Format with syntax highlighting and explanations
workflow.output: Code blocks with language tags and context
